comments.body: This part broke the example: it is not valid YAML. Because this error is intentional, I broke up the example into three parts: two correct YAML+Jinja2, and this one formatted as `text` inbetween.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +422,426 @@
    # FAILS
    tempdir: "C:\Windows\Temp"

This example shows the use of single quotes when they are required::
